info.title: API
info.description:
This is the API documentation for the Talent Protocol API latest version.
Internally, this version is referred to as v3.

The API allows to interact with the Talent Protocol platform in the following modes:

- API Key mode: You pass an API Key as value of the header `X-API-KEY` to authenticate.
You need to ask for an API Key to the Talent Protocol team.
- User authentication mode: You provide a JWT token as value of the header `Authorization`.
The JWT token is obtained by calling the endpoint `POST /auth/email_password_login` with the user credentials.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Talent Protocol API

get.summary: Get account using wallet, talent id or account identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Talent ID, wallet address or account identifier

owned_since.description: The timestamp of when the account was owned

connected_at.description: The timestamp of when the account was connected

get.summary: Get a profile using wallet, talent id or account identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Talent ID, wallet address or account identifier

display_name.description: The display name of the profile

image_url.description: The image url of the profile

onchain_since.description: The timestamp of when the profile did the first onchain transaction

ens.description: The ENS name of the profile

get.summary: Get the score using wallet, talent id or account identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Talent ID, wallet address or account identifier

last_calculated_at.description: The timestamp of when the score was last calculated

200.description: get profiles matching input query and sorted by sort specification

created_at.description: The ISO8601 timestamp of when the profile was created.

display_name.description: The display name of the profile.

human_checkmark.description: Indicates if the profile has a human checkmark.

image_url.description: The URL of the profile's image.

onchain.description: Indicates if the profile has an onchain ID.

calculating_score.description: Indicates if the profile is calculating its score.

tags.description: An array of tag descriptions associated with the profile.

total.description: The total number of profiles matching the query terms.

total_for_page.description: The total number of profiles on the current page.

point_in_time_id.description: The point in time ID used with Point In Time pagination mode.

search_after.description: The search_after value used with Point In Time pagination mode.

401.description: unauthorized request with wrong api key

get.summary: Get socials using wallet, talent id or account identifier

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Talent ID, wallet address or account identifier

follower_count.description: The count of followers of the profile social

following_count.description: The count of following of the profile social

location.description: The location of the profile social

owner.description: The timestamp of the profile social

bio.description: The bio of the profile social

display_name.description: The display name of the profile social

image_url.description: The profile image url of the profile social

name.description: The name of the profile social

owned_since.description: The timestamp of when the social was owned

profile_url.description: The url of the profile social

source.description: The source of the profile social
